newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Acoje leads gainers, up 25 pct by midtrade.
newsitem.headline: Acoje leads gainers, up 25 pct by midtrade.

text.p: Acoje Holdings Inc rose another 25 percent to 60 centavos by midsession from Monday's close of 48 centavos as punters chose the issue because of its venture into real estate, brokers said.

Allan Araullo, vice president of Regina Capital Development Corp, said speculators were training their sights on thirdliners as blue chips were consolidating after a hefty runup in the early part of the month.
"It's still the MetroClub story," Araullo said about Acoje.
Acoje announced last week that it had acquired 30 percent in Manila's Metropolitan Club (MetroClub). MetroClub is planning to develop the property where the sports club is located.
Acoje was the most widely traded stock on Tuesday with more than 172 million shares changing hands.
